2: 1 Мою сестру попросят прийти в шесть.
1 My sister will be asked to come at six.
2 The tickets must be bought today.
3 Диктант будут писать в следующий вторник.
3 The dictation will be written next Tuesday.
4 Our mother will be asked not tocome.
5 Your mother will be given a cup of coffee.
7 The letter is being sent now.
8 Она надеялась, что картину повесят в понедельник.
8 She hoped that the picture would be hung onMonday.
9 The magazines will be brought this week.
14 He will be answered at two.
15 I will be bought a new TV set tomorrow.
17 He has just been read the letter.
18 The newbooks will be bought tomorrow.
19 Kate will be asked to help.
20 Наташу попросили рассказать о своем путешествии.
20 Natasha has beenasked to tell about her trip.
21 The doctor was asked to come at six.
